column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Ka kyerɛ Israelmba ma wɔmfa ayɛyɛdze mbrɛ me: nyimpa biara a n’akoma pɛ no no hɔ na hom ngye m’ayɛyɛdze."

column2: "Na iyi nye ayɛyɛdze a hom ngye no wɔ hɔn hɔ; sika
column3: nye dwetɛ

column2: "nye bibir
column3: nye ɔberdum

column2: "nye nguannyin nwoma a wɔahyɛ no memen
column3: nye nsukraman nwoma; nye akeesia dua;"

column2: "kandzea ho ngo
column3: ɔserango ho nduhuam
column4: nye nduhuam a wɔhyew ho edur;"

column2: "abo a no su tse dɛ epopobibir
column3: nye abo a wɔdze besisi egugudo no

column2: "Na ma wɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔnbea mma me; ma maatsena hɔn mu."
"Dɛ mbrɛ merekyerɛ wo no nyinara
column3: ntamadan no saso
column4: nye no mu ndzɛmba nyinara ne saso
column5: dɛmara pɛ na hom nyɛ no."

column2: "Na wɔnyɛ akeesia dua adaka: ne tsentsen nyɛ bɛyɛ basafa kor na fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien na fa
column4: na no krɔn so bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien na fa."

column2: "Na fa sika mapa dura ho
column3: no mu nye n’ekyir na fa dura
column4: na yɛ ho sika hankra twa ho hyia."

column2: "Na gu no ho sika nkaba anan
column3: na fa tuatua n’anan anan no ho; na nkaba ebien ndzi n’afa fakor
column4: na nkaba ebien ndzi n’afa no ho."

column2: "Na fa dua sian mpoma
column3: na fa sika dura ho."

column2: "Na fa mpoma no hyehyɛ nkaba no mu wɔ adaka no ne nkyɛn mu
column3: ma wɔmfa nsoa adaka no."

column2: "Mpoma no nhyehyɛ adaka no ne nkaba no mu: mma wonnyiyi mmfi mu."
"Na fa dase a medze mebɛma wo no to adaka no mu."
"Na fa sika mapa yɛ mbɔbɔrhu egua: ne tsentsen nyɛ bɛyɛ basafa kor nye fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa."

column2: "Na yɛ sika kerubim ebien; ɔbor edwuma na fa yɛ
column3: wɔ mbɔbɔrhu egua ne tsir ebien no do."

column2: "Na yɛ kerubim kor wɔ ne tsir kor
column3: nye kerubim kor wɔ ne tsir kor so: mbɔbɔrhu egua no mu na hom mma kerubim ebien no mfi wɔ ne tsir ebien no do."

column2: "Na kerubim no ntserɛtserɛw hɔn ntsaban mu wɔ ɔsor
column3: mfa hɔn ntsaban no nkata mbɔbɔrhu egua no do
column4: hɔn enyim ndzi abɔenyim; mbɔbɔrhu egua no do na kerubim no hɔn enyim mbedzi."

column2: "Na fa mbɔbɔrhu egua no si adaka no do sor; na adaka no mu na fa dase a medze mebɛma wo no to."
"Na hɔ na menye wo behyia
column3: na mefi mbɔbɔrhu egua no do wɔ kerubim ebien a wɔwɔ dasedaka no do no ntamu maka wo ndzɛmba a mebɛhyɛ wo dɛ fa kyerɛ Israelmba no nyinara ho nsɛm."

column2: "Na fa akeesia dua pon: ne tsentsen nyɛ basafa kor
column3: ne tɛtɛr anamɔn kor nye fa
column4: na no krɔn bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa."

column2: "Na fa sika mapa dura ho
column3: na yɛ ho sika hankra hyia."

column2: "Na yɛ ho ntotoano a ɔbɛyɛ nsatseama  hyia
column3: na yɛ ntotoano no ho sika hankra hyia."
column4: "#25.25 NSATSEAMA: Iyi yɛ abasamu kor ne tsentsen."

column2: "Na yɛ ho sika nkaba anan
column3: na fa nkaba no sisi nkutuw anan a ɔwowɔ n’anan anan no ho no do."

column2: "Ntotoano no nkyɛn papaapa na nkaba no ndzi
column3: ma ɔnyɛ beebi mbrɛ wɔdze mpoma no bɛhyehyɛ dze asoa ɔpon no."

column2: "Na fa akeesia dua sinsian mpoma no
column3: na fa sika duradura ho

column2: "Na yɛ do mboyaa
column3: nye ntser
column5: nye nkorbaa a wɔdze bohue: sika mapa na fa yɛ."

column2: "Na fa kyerɛpaanoo si pon no do wɔ m’enyim daa."
"Na fa sika mapa yɛ kandzeadua: ɔbor edwuma na fa yɛ kandzeadua no
column3: n’anan
column4: nye no dua; no ho mpokuwa
column7: mfi sin kor no ara mu:"

column2: "na abaw esia mfifi ne nkyɛn mu; kandzeadua n’abaw ebiasa mfi n’afa fakor
column3: na kandzeadua no n’abaw ebiasa so mfi n’afa kor so:"

column2: "mpokuwa ebiasa a wɔayɛ no dɛ almɔnd nhyiren wɔ abaw kor ho
column3: kukuduuduw nye nhyiren; na mpokuwa ebiasa a wɔayɛ no dɛ almɔnd nhyiren wɔ abaw kor no so ho
column4: kukuduuduw nye nhyiren: dɛm na yɛ wɔ abaw esia a efifir wɔ kandzeadua no ho no ho:"

column2: "na kandzeadua no ho mpokuwa anan a wɔayɛ no dɛ almɔnd nhyiren
column3: no kukuduuduw nye ne nhyiren:"

column2: "na kukuduuduw nhyɛ abaw ebien a otuatua ho no ase
column3: na kukuduuduw nhyɛ abaw ebien a otuatua ho no ase
column4: na kukuduuduw nhyɛ abaw ebien a otuatua ho no ase wɔ abaw esia a efifir kandzeadua no mu no ase."

column2: "No ho nkukuduuduw nye no ho abaw no mfi mu ara
column3: ne nyinara sika mapa na wɔmfa nyɛ no ɔbor edwuma kor."

column2: "Na yɛ ne nkandzea no esuon: na wɔnsosɔ ne nkandzea no
column3: ma ɔngyegye wɔ n’enyim."

column2: "Na no ho adabaa
column3: nye no ho nsompokuwa nyɛ sika mapa."

column2: "Sika mapa kyɛpɛn kor na wɔmfa nyɛ
column3: ɔnye no ho ndzɛmba yi nyinara."

column2: "Na hwɛ na yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ no nsusudo a wɔdze akyerɛ wo wɔ bepɔw no do no tse."
